name: Samurai Strike
description:
An LCD duel game built for the Dogpit LCD Jam

One hit is all you get. Defeat as many enemies as possible by countering their strikes - or get the first hit in yourself. High strikes beat mid strikes, mid strikes beat low strikes, low strikes beat high strikes.

Two Player mode is a first to 10 competition.

Controls:

Startup/Game Over Controls:
1 - Start new single player game
2 - Start new two player game
A - Raise single player difficulty
Z - Lower single player difficulty

1P Controls:
A - Raise stance
Z - Lower stance
Space - Attack

2P Controls:
Up Arrow - Raise stance
Down Arrow - Lower stance
Right Shift - Attack

Press 0 at any time to toggle the LCD screen overlay if you don't like it

Uses Digital 7 Mono font by Sizenko Alexander
